Because of a titan’s Quicken Spell-Like Ability feat, it can use chain lightning as a free action, and frequently attacks in melee while lashing out with this ability at the same time.Prior to combat: Invisibility purge or invisibility.Round 1: Charge and attempt to sunder the weapon of the most dangerous foe.
